author: cnbc.com
title: Seagate Technology to Report Fiscal Third 2018 Financial Results on May 1, 2018
text:
CUPERTINO, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Seagate Technology plc (NASDAQ: STX) will report fiscal third quarter 2018 financial results before the market opens on Tuesday, May 1, 2018. The investment community conference call to discuss these results will take place that day at 6:00 a.m. Pacific / 9:00 a.m. Eastern.
The live conference call can be accessed online at Seagateâ€™s Investor Relations website at www.seagate.com/investors .
About Seagate
Seagate creates space for the human experience by innovating how data is stored, shared and used. Learn more at www.seagate.com .
